sentence.Network_en: By and by electricity will take the place of coal.
Summer vacation will come by and by.
He'll come round by and by.

list.abs: 大学英语四级常用词组 ... by and by 不久以后，将来 by and large 总的来说，大体上 by oneself 单独；独自，自行.

means.word_mean: 1. an indefinite time in the future;

sentences.sentence: "he'll get around to it in the sweet by-and-by"
